channel.title: Webclient error when you load it twice
channel.description:
when i load up my webclient on the page once, it loads fine but if i refresh the page i getz an error here's my html code [code] Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run

Get the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/ [/code] any help plz :) ?
